snippet: Mike Woodson, the Knicks’ interim coach, has relied on J. R. Smith more than Mike D’Antoni did, but Smith’s emotions can get the best of him and affect his play.
abstract: New York Knicks’ interim coach Mike Woodson says shooting guard J R Smith needs to play with more composure and consistency.
lead_paragraph: Mike Woodson, the Knicks’ interim coach, has relied on J. R. Smith more than Mike D’Antoni did, but Smith’s emotions can get the best of him and affect his play.

headline.seo: J.R. Smith Needs More Composure, Knicks Interim Coach Mike Woodson Says
headline.main: Woodson Wants Smith to Keep His Composure
headline.print_headline: Smith Needs Composure and Consistency, Woodson Says
